entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023
